learn: Jumpers, Pushbutton, Buzzer, Resistors, RGB LED

build.steps: Connect the pushbutton, RGB LED and four 220ohm resistors on the breadboard

steps: 1.Connect a jumper wire from 5V to the positive rail of the breadboard
2.Connect a jumper wire from positive rail to the pushbutton
3.Connect a jumper wire from GND to the negative rail of the breadboard
4.Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to one side of the resistor
5.Connect a jumper wire from D13 to one side of the resistor
1.Connect a jumper wire from D2 to the  first pin of the RGB
2.Connect a jumper wire from negative  rail to the second pin of the RGB
3.Connect a jumper wire from D3 to the  third pin of the RGB
4.Connect a jumper wire from D6 to the  fourth pin of the RGB
1.Connect a jumper wire from D10 to the positive pin of the buzzer
2.Connect a jumper wire from negative  rail to the negative pin of the buzzer
